modName: ST Basic Armor and Clothing Retextures
summary: A few basic retextures of armor and clothing
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=+1.5]ST Basic Armor and Clothing Retextures[/size][/b]

- - - -
[b][size=+1.2]Description[/size][/b]
- - - -

Like quite a few people out there, I tweaked some textures. Here is where I\'ll put up some of mine, in case others care to enjoy them.


List of Stuff:

[b]Necromancer Robe[/b],
Changed the colour of the emblem to red. Feel it is a happy middle ground between the old and new Necromancer symbols.

[b]Nightingale Armor[/b],
Shifted it to a dark blue hue. Felt it blends better with the darkness and wanted to differentiate it a little more from the Dark Brotherhood armor colour scheme.

[b]Shrouded Robes aka Dark Brotherhood Robes[/b] , (includes gloves and hood as well)
Felt the red was a little too bright, darkened and desaturated slightly. 
(Also helps to better match the Shrouded Armor texture I\'m using. A slightly modified [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2260]Deadly Serious Shrouded Armor[/url] )


- - - -
Installation
- - - -
Extract the contents of the file to your Skyrim Directory.
author: SmileyTops
